function.name: mopping_start
function.description: This function is used to initiate mop cleaning with a robot vacuum around designated rooms or objects.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to initiate mop cleaning.

rvcLocations.description: The locations around which the robot vacuum should perform mop cleaning.

rvcObjects.description: The objects around which the robot vacuum should perform mop cleaning.
